text: Gallant Journey (also known as The Great Highway) is a 1946 American drama movie directed by William A. Wellman and starring Glenn Ford, Janet Blair, Charles Ruggles, Henry Travers, Charles Kemper, Arthur Shields, Willard Robertson. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman
title: Gallant Journey
